name: Greater Reposition

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: You receive a +2 bonus on checks made to reposition a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Improved Reposition. Whenever you reposition a foe, his movement provokes attacks of opportunity from all of your allies (but not you).
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Creatures moved by reposition do not provoke attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Normal

description: When you reposition foes, they are left vulnerable to the attacks of your allies.
